title: Is Nasus' Q canonical within the story
body: And if so. How many stacks do you think he has

replies.body: how long has he been alive? and how many battles has he fought in?  cuz if i remember correctly he spent most of his time in the library.  also how many people didnt respect the silence rule in said library?

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=cb6Ru44N,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-18T00:49:20.527+0000)
>
> how long has he been alive? and how many battles has he fought in?  cuz if i remember correctly he spent most of his time in the library.  also how many people didnt respect the silence rule in said library?

Who ever didn't respect the silence rule. Will respect the cane.
